definition: (a) ruin, abstractly (the act) or concretely (the wreck)

translations.de: (a) Ruin, abstrakt (die Handlung) oder konkret (das Wrack)
translations.el: (α) καταστροφή, αφηρημένα (η πράξη) ή συγκεκριμένα (το ναυάγιο)
translations.es: (a) ruina, en abstracto (el acto) o en concreto (el naufragio)
translations.hu: (a) romlás, elvontan (a cselekmény) vagy konkrétan (a roncs)
translations.id: (a) kehancuran, secara abstrak (tindakan) atau secara konkret (kecelakaan)
translations.ja: (a)抽象的（行為）または具体的（沈没船）な破滅
translations.nl: (a) ruïne, abstract (de handeling) of concreet (het wrak)
translations.pt: (a) ruína, abstrata (o ato) ou concreta (o naufrágio)
translations.tr: (a) yıkım, soyut olarak (eylem) veya somut olarak (enkaz)
translations.zh: (a) 毁灭，抽象地（行为）或具体地（残骸）
